properties.body:
STRAIT OF OTRANTO.
GREECE TO ITALY.
DNC 09.
VESSEL, WHITE AND RED HULL, ONE PERSON ON BOARD,
UNREPORTED MERLERA ISLAND 39-52.5N 019-34.6E TO
OTRANTO 40-09.1N 018-29.6E. VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF
POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
INMARSAT-C: 424744220, PHONE: 3906 5908 4527,
3906 5908 4409, FAX: 390 6592 2737,
3906 5908 4793, E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
